actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to cooperate with States and their political subdivisions for the purpose of obtaining law enforcement service at water resources development projects under jurisdiction of the Secretary of the Interior.
subjects: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to reimburse and otherwise cooperate with State or local governments for the provision of law enforcement services at water resources development projects.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to cooperate with States and their political subdivisions for the purpose of obtaining law enforcement service at water resources development projects under jurisdiction of the Secretary of the Interior.
